plot: A bunch of co-eds are raped by a gang of guys. One year later, the women locate the guys and seduce them by pretending to be prostitutes. Once the guys are asleep, the women pull out hidden guns and butcher them.
title: Savage Fury
plot_es: A bunch of co-eds are raped by a gang of guys. One year later, the women locate the guys and seduce them by pretending to be prostitutes. Once the guys are asleep, the women pull out hidden guns and butcher them.
plot_en: A bunch of co-eds are raped by a gang of guys. One year later, the women locate the guys and seduce them by pretending to be prostitutes. Once the guys are asleep, the women pull out hidden guns and butcher them.
